root.name: Raiden Fighters Aces
root.description: Raiden Fighters Aces is a compilation of the first 3 games in the Raiden Fighters shooter subseries. It includes Raiden Fighters, Raiden Fighters 2, and Raiden Fighters Jet.This iteration adds support for Xbox Live Leaderboards, leting you upload and watch other peoples' replays, and has strategies for all of the games on the main disc.The game was released in Japan on March 27, 2008 and was released on May 12, 2009 in the United States.FeaturesIn addition to the arcade ports, the game allows customization of each individual game from amount of starting credits, level sequences, which ships are present at the selection screen, and display setups. The game also has a practice mode that allows beginners to practice the controls and a slow motion ability that can be activated on command.
